Package gui

Class MessagePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • gui.MessagePanel

  • public class MessagePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    A specialized JPanel that represents a message obtained from a service.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Daniel Freitas
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
